import React, { Component } from "react"; import Slider from "./components/NetflixSlider"; import "./App.scss"; const movies = [ { id: 1, image: "/images/imagesimported/resized_images_2/Screen Shot 2020-07-08 at 125813 PM.jpg", imageBg: "/images/imagesimported/resized_images_2/Screen Shot 2020-07-08 at 125813 PM.jpg", title: "Slide One", transitionWidth: 1.5, transitionEase: 100, transitionSize: 500, numHovers: 0, numClicks: 0, }, { id: 2, image: "/images/imagesimported/resized (3)/Image from iOS.jpg", imageBg: "/images/slide2b.webp", title: "Slide Two", transitionWidth: 1.325, transitionEase: 100, transitionSize: 100, numHovers: 0, numClicks: 0, }, { id: 3, image: "/images/imagesimported/resized_images_2/Screen Shot 2020-07-08 at 125856 PM.jpg", imageBg: "/images/slide3b.webp", title: "Slide Three", transitionWidth: 1.11, transitionEase: 100, transitionSize: 100, numHovers: 0, numClicks: 0, }, { id: 4, image: "/images/imagesimported/resized/background1.jpg", imageBg: "/images/slide4b.webp", title: "Slide Four", transitionWidth: 1.25, transitionEase: 100, transitionSize: 1000, numHovers: 0, numClicks: 0, }, { id: 5, image: "/images/imagesimported/resized/background2.jpg", imageBg: "/images/slide5b.webp", title: "Slide Five", transitionWidth: 1.01, transitionEase: 100, transitionSize: 250, numHovers: 0, numClicks: 0, }, { id: 6, image: "/images/imagesimported/resized/background5.jpg", imageBg: "/images/slide6b.webp", title: "Slide Six", transitionWidth: 1.22, transitionEase: 100, transitionSize: 450, numHovers: 0, numClicks: 0, }, { id: 7, image: "/images/imagesimported/resized_images_2/Screen Shot 2020-07-08 at 125750 PM.jpg", imageBg: "/images/slide6b.webp", title: "Slide Seven", transitionWidth: 1.75, transitionEase: 100, transitionSize: 120, numHovers: 0, numClicks: 0, }, ]; class App extends Component { render() { return (

Slider One

{movies.map((movie) => ( item1 ))}
